name: Music_925.wav
keywords: ['choir', 'harmonica', 'guitar song', 'no percussion', 'slow tempo', 'male voices', 'female voices', 'romantic theme']
caption: This song features a choir with male and female voices. Some of the male voices sing the bass part of the vocals. This is accompanied by a harmonica playing a high pitched melody. An acoustic guitar plays arpeggiated chords. After the instruments come to a rest, the voices continue to sing in harmony without the instruments. This song has a romantic mood.
